attributes.action: Ban Halal slaughter and halal meat sale in Great Britatin unless clearly labelled in shops and clearly signed in restaurants
attributes.additional_details:
We demand that Halal Meat has its own section in shops away from Non-Islamic slaughtered meat,
Also all take away & restaurant establishments need clear signage in English NOT Islamic! This needs to clearly state what the customer is purchasing, Clearly explaining the method of slaughter.
OTherwise it needs to be banned from sale in this country.
